name: Wirreles Headpnones
description: Wireless Headphones - Ultimate Sound Experience.
description1: Immerse yourself in crystal-clear audio with our Wireless Headphones. Designed for both comfort and performance these headphones offer an unparalleled listening experience with advanced features and sleek modern design. Whether you’re working out commuting or relaxing at home these headphones provide an exceptional wire-free experience allowing you to enjoy music podcasts and calls without distractions.
description2: Key Features
description3: Superior Sound Quality Equipped with high-fidelity drivers the headphones deliver rich bass clear mids and sparkling treble for an immersive listening experience
description4: Bluetooth Connectivity Easily connect to your smartphone tablet laptop or other Bluetooth-enabled devices without the hassle of wires. Enjoy seamless pairing and a stable connection with a range of up to 30 feet
description5: Noise-Canceling Technology Block out external noise with the built-in active noise cancellation (ANC) feature so you can focus on your music or calls even in noisy environments
description6: Long Battery Life With up to 20 hours of playtime on a full charge these headphones are perfect for long commutes travel or a full day of work. Plus they offer a quick recharge feature so you can get back to listening faster
description7: Comfortable Fit The adjustable headband and memory foam ear cushions ensure a snug yet comfortable fit for long listening sessions. The lightweight design makes them ideal for all-day wear
description8: Built-in Microphone Take calls effortlessly with the integrated microphone offering clear voice transmission for hands-free communication. Ideal for conference calls chatting with friends or managing your day-to-day activities
description9: Touch Controls Adjust volume skip tracks answer calls and more with simple touch controls on the ear cup. No need to take out your device everything is at your fingertips
description10: Stylish and Portable The foldable design makes it easy to store and carry and the sleek modern look ensures you always stay in style
description11: Specifications
description12: Bluetooth version 5.0 Battery life Up to 20 hours Charging time 1.5 hours Noise-canceling Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) Weight 250g Frequency Response 20Hz – 20kHz Connectivity Wireless (Bluetooth) Compatible with iOS Android and other Bluetooth devices Microphone Yes (built-in)
description13: Why Choose Our Wireless Headphones
description14: Experience superior audio quality without the hassle of wires Ideal for daily use travel or as a companion for workouts Enjoy comfort style and convenience with every use
description15: Elevate your listening experience today with our Wireless Headphones designed for those who appreciate quality sound and freedom of movement

name: Gaming Headset
description: The Gaming Headset is designed to provide an exceptional audio experience for gamers.
description1: Its high-fidelity drivers deliver rich, detailed sound, making every explosion and footstep feel lifelike.
description2: The headset features virtual surround sound, creating a 3D soundscape to help you pinpoint enemy movements with precision.
description3: A noise-isolating microphone ensures clear communication by reducing background noise during team calls or gaming sessions.
description4: With an adjustable headband and plush ear cushions, it offers comfort for extended gaming marathons.
description5: The lightweight design minimizes fatigue, even during long hours of gameplay. Customizable RGB lighting on the ear cups lets you add style and match your gaming setup.
description6: The headset is compatible with multiple platforms, including PC, PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and mobile devices.
description7: It connects via a standard 3.5mm audio jack or USB, ensuring versatility for all gaming needs. Convenient in-line controls allow you to adjust volume, mute the microphone, or toggle sound modes with ease. Built with durable materials, the headset is designed to withstand intense use and last through countless gaming sessions.
description8: Its 50mm drivers provide a frequency response range of 20Hz to 20kHz for immersive audio.
description9: The detachable boom microphone adds flexibility, and the customizable lighting enhances your gaming ambiance.
description10: With a cable length of 2.2 meters, it provides freedom of movement while gaming.
description11: The Gaming Headset combines performance, comfort, and style, making it a perfect choice for gamers.
description12: Elevate your gaming experience with superior sound and unmatched features.
description13: The Gaming Headset offers high-fidelity audio and virtual surround sound for an immersive gaming experience.
description14: Designed with comfort in mind, it features plush ear cushions, an adjustable headband, and durable materials for extended use.
description15: Compatible with multiple platforms, it also includes a noise-isolating microphone, customizable RGB lighting, and intuitive in-line controls for seamless performance.

name: Bluetooth Earbuds
description: Bluetooth Earbuds deliver crystal-clear sound with powerful bass and balanced treble.
description1: They are designed for both comfort and convenience, making them ideal for everyday use.
description2: The lightweight and ergonomic design ensures a snug fit for all-day wear.
description3: With advanced Bluetooth 5.0 technology, they provide a stable and seamless connection.
description4: The earbuds offer up to 8 hours of playtime on a single charge.
description5: The portable charging case extends the battery life to a total of 24 hours.
description6: Active noise cancellation minimizes background sounds for focused listening.
description7: Transparency mode allows you to stay aware of your surroundings when needed.
description8: Touch controls on the earbuds let you adjust volume, skip tracks, and answer calls.
description9: The built-in microphone ensures clear voice quality during phone calls or video chats.
description10: They are water-resistant, making them perfect for workouts and outdoor activities.
description11: Quick charging gives you 1 hour of playback with just a 10-minute charge.
description12: They are compatible with iOS, Android, and other Bluetooth-enabled devices.
description13: The earbuds automatically pair with your device when taken out of the case.
description14: Compact and stylish, they easily fit into your pocket or bag.
description15: Bluetooth Earbuds are the perfect combination of style, functionality, and performance.

name: Over-Ear Headphones
description: Over-Ear Headphones deliver immersive, high-fidelity audio with rich bass and clear treble.

description2: They feature soft, memory foam ear cushions for maximum comfort during long use.
description3: An adjustable headband ensures a perfect fit for all head sizes.

description7: Built-in controls on the ear cups allow you to adjust volume and skip tracks easily.
description8: A built-in microphone enables clear hands-free calls and voice assistant activation.
description9: Active noise-canceling technology blocks out ambient noise for focused listening.
description10: The headphones support wired connections with an included 3.5mm audio cable.
description11: They fold compactly for easy storage and portability.
description12: Compatible with smartphones, tablets, laptops, and other Bluetooth devices.
description13: High-quality materials ensure durability and a premium look and feel.
description14: They are ideal for music, gaming, or watching movies with exceptional sound quality.

name: Wacom Intuos Pro
description: The Wacom Intuos Pro is a professional-grade graphics tablet designed for creative professionals.
description1: It features a large, high-resolution, customizable working area for precision and accuracy.
description2: The tablet comes with a pressure-sensitive pen that provides natural pen-on-paper feel.
description3: It offers 8192 levels of pressure sensitivity for detailed and nuanced drawing.
description4: The pen includes customizable buttons and an eraser, enhancing workflow efficiency.
description5: It connects seamlessly to both Windows and macOS devices via USB or Bluetooth.
description6: The tablet supports multi-touch gestures for intuitive control and navigation.
description7: It features eight customizable ExpressKeys™ for quick access to shortcuts and commands.
description8: The included Pro Pen 2 provides precise control with tilt recognition and virtually no lag.
description9: The tablet's surface is designed to reduce glare and provide a smooth drawing experience.
description10: It is ideal for digital artists, illustrators, designers, and photographers.
description11: The Wacom Intuos Pro works with popular creative software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and CorelDRAW.
description12: It includes a wireless charging dock for the pen, eliminating the need for batteries.
description13: The tablet is built with durable materials for long-lasting performance.
description14: It supports customizable touch rings for zooming, scrolling, and rotating.
description15: The Wacom Intuos Pro offers precision, versatility, and professional-grade performance for creative work.

name: USB-C to Lightning Cable
description: The USB-C to Lightning Cable allows you to charge and sync your Apple devices.
description1: It is designed to connect USB-C devices, such as laptops or chargers, to Lightning-enabled iPhones or iPads.
description2: The cable supports fast charging, enabling quicker battery replenishment for your Apple devices.
description3: It is made from durable materials, ensuring long-lasting performance and flexibility.
description4: The compact and lightweight design makes it easy to carry and store.

description7: It features reversible connectors, so you can plug it in either way.
description8: The USB-C to Lightning Cable supports power delivery (PD), providing optimal charging efficiency.
description9: It has built-in safety features to protect your devices from overcurrent and overheating.
description10: The cable is designed to withstand everyday wear and tear, ensuring reliable performance.
description11: It allows you to sync your data at high speeds between your Apple devices and your computer.
description12: The cable supports up to 20W fast charging, perfect for quickly topping up your device’s battery.
description13: It provides a secure and stable connection for charging and syncing without interruption.
description14: The USB-C to Lightning Cable is perfect for use with new-generation Apple devices.
description15: It combines fast charging, durability, and efficient data transfer for everyday use.

name: 3.5mm Audio Cable
